label: masterReplicas
description: spark master replicas and default is 1

label: masterDaemonMemory
description: spark master daemonMemory and default is 1g

label: workerReplicas
description: spark worker replicas and default is 3

label: workerDaemonMemory
description: spark worker daemonMemory and default is 1g

label: workerExecutorMemory
description: spark worker executorMemory and default is 1g

label: zeppelinReplicas
description: spark zeppelin replicas and default is 1

label: zeppelinConfigPersistentVolumeSize
description: zeppelin config persistent volume size and default is 10(Gi)

label: zepplinNotebookPersistentVolumeSize
description: zeppelin notebook persistent volume size and default is 10(Gi)
